member.summary: Clears the report viewer navigation history

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.ClearHistory
member.summary: Clears the report viewer navigation history.
member.remarks:
Use this method to remove all viewer history records generated:
From method after the property is changed.
From method with different parameter values.
From interactivity action.
All history records including for the currently shown ReportSource are deleted.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.NavigateBack
member.summary: Navigates the viewer back one step in the navigation history.
member.remarks:
Check if this operation is enabled. If not, exception is thrown.
The property will reflect the change in the currently shown report.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.CanMoveToPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the viewer can be navigated to a specified page.
member.param: The page number to determine navigation possibility.
member.returns: Returns true if the viewer can be moved to the specified page.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.Reset
member.summary: Resets the control to its default values.

members.member:
Loads and refreshes the current report source in the viewer.
A new history record will be added in the report history. .

Loads and refreshes the in the viewer.
Use this method to display in the viewer the report source from the property.
Fresh report data is pulled from the report source data sources. Adds new history record in the report history right after the current record and the new record becomes current.
This method should not be called before the Form.Load() event is fired (avoid using it in the Form's constructor). .

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.Preview
member.summary: Renders the report in the viewer passing the currently entered parameter values to the report.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.CancelRendering(System.Int32)
member.summary: Stops background processing of the report.
member.returns: A Boolean value. A value of true is returned if the background rendering has terminated. A value of false is returned if background rendering has not terminated after the amount of time specified in the millisecondsTimeout parameter has elapsed, or if the millisecondsTimeout parameter was set to 0.
member.param: The number of milliseconds to wait for the background rendering to terminate. A value of -1 waits forever. A value of 0 returns immediately without waiting for the rendering to terminate.
